Headline: Southbound #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland Temporary Reroute near Narragansett/Addison
ShortDescription: SB 86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temp rerouted via Narragansett, Addison, Auston, Belmont, Narragansett due to street blockage near Narragansett/Addison

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Narragansett, Addison, Auston, Belmont, and Narragansett due to, street blockage near Narragansett/Addison.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green Line Service Delayed at California
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are standing near California due to unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are standing near California due to unauthorized person on the tracks.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
